    Required method from LogAnalyzer interface.
    analyze(String) - Method in class analysis.LevelCounter
    Processes a single log level string and increments its count.
    analyze(String) - Method in interface analysis.LogAnalyzer
    Analyzes a single string value from a log entry.
    analyze(String) - Method in class analysis.SourceCounter
    Increments the count for the given log source.
    analyze(String, LogEntry) - Method in class analysis.AnomalyDetector
    Analyzes a single log entry and stores it per file if it matches a tracked level.
    AnalyzerFactory - Class in analysis
    A factory class for creating a list of LogAnalyzer objects based on the analysis types specified in the configuration.
    AnalyzerFactory() - Constructor for class analysis.AnalyzerFactory
     
    AnomalyDetector - Class in analysis
    AnomalyDetector identifies bursts of log entries based on configured severity levels within a given time window.
    AnomalyDetector(Set<String>, int, int) - Constructor for class analysis.AnomalyDetector
    Constructs an AnomalyDetector with the given configuration parameters.

    C

    call() - Method in class processing.LogFileProcessor
    Reads the log file line by line and applies each analyzer to the relevant part of the parsed log entry.

    D

    detectAnomalies() - Method in class analysis.AnomalyDetector
    Detects anomalies in all processed log entries.

    G

    getAnalysisTypes() - Method in class config.ConfigManager
    Returns the list of requested analysis types from the configuration.

    Returns the threshold for number of entries to qualify as an anomaly.

    Returns the time window (in seconds) for anomaly detection.
    getCounts() - Method in class analysis.LevelCounter
    Returns a map of log levels to their respective counts.

    Finds and returns the name of the source that appeared least frequently.

    Returns the number of times the least common source appeared.
    getLevel() - Method in class model.LogEntry
    Returns the log level of the entry.
    getLogDirectory() - Method in class config.ConfigManager

    Finds and returns the name of the source that appeared most frequently.

    getTimestamp() - Method in class model.LogEntry

    S
